str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A wall, especially of a city. Akin to the base of tikto; a wall.
Jericho, a city a little north of the Dead Sea. Of Hebrew origin; Jericho, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.

word: after [the people] had marched around them
parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: To encircle, besiege, surround. From the same as kukloi; to encircle, i.e. Surround.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
